title: Red Shell

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: The upper text explains the mechanic.

desc:
Post 2392
- __Tag: Mario Kart__: This card cannot be played and has its passives disabled unless if this is the most recent-drawn __Mario Kart__ item card.

- You have 🛡️ equal to the **Echo** value of this card + 1 and are linked.
 - A Blue Shell (223) meant for you discards this card before it activates onto you.
- Playing this card sends a red shell forward, causing the player ahead of you in terms of placement with cards in hand to draw 1 card and lose 3 💵 if done successfully.
- If there is no player ahead of you, playing it has no effect.
